title: New York Subway Free by Zuti
creator: Visual IT Limited

extendedInfo.description: New York Subway is a superb map and route planner for the NYC Subway and transport systems.â KEY FEATURES â â Simple, fast and easy to use. â Designed for the first time visitor and experienced commuter. â Unique "Minute Map" feature provides a view of travel times from any location on the map. â Professionally drawn colourful and clear map with geographical features and places of interest. â Planned route animates on the map. â Online street map integration ( internet connection required). â Services can be turned on or off, routing around problems. â Works in both landscape and portrait modes. â Covers all time-zones - evening, day, rush hours and weekends. â Easily locates your nearest transport stop. â Places of interest, parks etc are built in to the application. â View live service advisories (internet connection required).â OVERVIEW â The New York Subway - Map and route planner by Zuti makes it easy to travel in and around New York using the subway, Staten Island railway, Staten Island ferry and JFK Airtrain. The application contains a professionally drawn map and route planner with many unique features. The map provides a simple and colourful view of the city transport services with the ability to flip to an online street map view when an internet connection is available. This way the user can view the online map when above ground and the transport map and route planning is still fully functional underground or anywhere there is no internet connectivity. This provides the best of both worlds, the transport map and route planning anytime, anywhere and online street maps and search when a connection is available. â ROUTING â The application does not require an internet connection and will always be available to display a clear and detailed view of the city transport system, plus list and animate the optimum route for your journey. Provides the fastest route calculations of any mobile routing application (virtually instantaneous) using actual published journey times with the ability to select the quickest route or the route with the least changes. Comprehensive details of your planned route are provided, including âdirectionâ, âtowardsâ and âservice frequencyâ information (not available on any other offline journey planner) for example âTake the 3 7th Av Express line (Southbound) towards New Lots Av for 17 mins (7 stops). Service runs every 5 minutesâ which is essential when finding the correct platform and direction. Also given are alternatives for each leg of the journey. â NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED â The map and routing do not require an internet connection and you will not be charged data connection fees. This means the application saves on battery power and runs perfectly underground, on an aeroplane, etc. For international visitors to a city who have data roaming turned off this is an ideal solution. â LIVE INFO â When an internet connection is available, optional "Live Information" on the current state of the transport services can be viewed allowing you to plan your journeys in advance and avoid any potential delays. Unique to this application is the ability to turn off services that are out of action and automatically calculate an alternative route. â MINUTE MAP â The unique minute map feature provides a view of walking times from any location on the map. This is helpful for getting a sense of scale and connectivity of the transport system and can provide some interesting results. For example is it quicker to use the subway to go from Harlem/7 Avenue to 155 Street/8 Avenue or is it quicker on foot? (Hint, the quickest route will keep you fitter). No other application makes it so easy to get around on the subway and allow you to make your travel decisions.Please note, This application is supported via advertising. If you would rather no adverts please see our New York Subway app.

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Love the new map.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clear and simple to use
reviews.comment: Clear map which looks really good and makes navigating the subway a whole lot easier. Works well on the Nexus 7. Pinch zoom now much improved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy and good
reviews.comment: Maps and written instructions; so easy to use
reviews.author: Stephanie Danielson

reviews.title: Brilliant!!
reviews.comment: Really attractive map nice and easy to use :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Very good app helped me get everywhere I needed to go
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kya yaar
reviews.comment: Para magic c
A good app for free. Accurate & reliable. Doesn\'t list bus connections: Google Maps does; but use it underground w/no signal; & uses less battery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Tourist Tool
reviews.comment: Used it last time I was in NYC. Was pretty good, used it a lot, but I don\'t know whether I\'d want more dynamic functionality if I was a resident with a data plan.  Check out the TFL app (London) for what a good transit app should do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works very well with my evo, but going with hopstop for the multi-city option. This app is great for just NYC though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ugly but functional
reviews.comment: Quick, usable, but not nice to look at.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent! Can\'t find the advanced paid application though. Would love to have that if the price is right.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Custom map of NY/NJ heavy rail/subway. Resolution needs improvement if pay. Would like to try out Routing feature b4 having to upgrade.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nothing special...
reviews.comment: Map cant zoom using pinch, everyyhing needs upgrade...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ever been on an express train in a hurry and begin to notice it\'s stopping every 8 blocks on another line?? That\'s why this app beats the others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No pinch zoom... No way to tell express from local. Quirky interface. Very blah app...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: NYC SUBWAY
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tourist Review
reviews.comment: Its confusing with or without this app took 4days to figure out the subway but 3 stars since this app helped me when I didn\'t have phone service
reviews.author: Manny Flores

reviews.title: Has one big flaw
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t show which stations are express stops. Other than that routing is good and the new style map looks great.
reviews.author: Peter Gates

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app. Fast route planning and updates.
reviews.author: A Google User
